alert.note: Alert for Adair; Cherokee; Delaware (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued February 08 at 1:45PM CST until February 10 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...The Flood Advisory continues for the following rivers in Oklahoma...Arkansas... Illinois River at Chewey affecting Cherokee, Adair and Delaware Counties. Flint Creek near Kansas affecting Cherokee and Delaware Counties. Mulberry River near Mulberry affecting Crawford and Franklin Counties. ...FLOOD ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL FRIDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...Illinois River at Chewey. * WHEN...Until Friday evening. * IMPACTS...At 9.0 feet, no flooding occurs but all recreational floating along the Illinois River ceases due to strong turbulence. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1:15 PM CST Wednesday the stage was 6.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 10.0 feet tomorrow evening. - Action stage is 9.0 feet. - Flood stage is 12.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
